response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our unique and valuable product to you. This product holds immense worth to us, but we understand its value might be different for you. We are offering this exceptional opportunity to acquire it at a special price of $950,000. We believe this is a fair deal that respects both the value of the product and your budget. Should you have any questions or need more information, please don't hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 950000}
